productBaseInfoV1.title: IFB 6 kg Fully Automatic Front Load with In-built Heater White(Diva Aqua BX)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: IFB Diva Aqua SX 6 Kg Front Loading Washing Machine is a reliable efficient solution delivering the perfect wash for your clothes. The washing machine is engineered with 2D Wash System, wherein the wash and rinse cycle uses a shower system that ensures thorough soaking, thereby giving a cleaner wash. The Aqua Energie filter treatment incorporates advanced magnet technology, breaking down calcium into minute crystals and energising the water. It facilitates best use of detergent by dissolving it better to lend a softer wash for your clothes. The IFB Diva Aqua SX Washing Machine comes with a unique Laundry Add feature, which lets you slip some more clothes you have missed midway through the cycle! The machine's Auto Balance system makes it automatically detect and redistribute unbalanced clothes, to maintain a stable and consistent wash throughout. The Diva Aqua SX assures the most efficient elimination of the toughest of stains on your clothes. In addition, the washing machine's smooth crescent moon grooves on the drum surface create a gentle water cushioning. This prevents any damage to the fabrics in the course of the wash, and result in clothes that are clean and as good as new. The IFB washing machine is designed with Ball Valve Technology. The Float Ball Valve lets the water out, while keeping the detergent in. This prevents any wastage of detergent and thereby, enhances the wash. The washing machine promises to deliver the most intensive cleaning to your clothes, through the most optimum application of water and detergent.

productBaseInfoV1.title: LG 7.5 kg Semi Automatic Top Load White, Maroon(P8541R3SA)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Enhance your clothes washing experience with this LG semi-automatic top-load washing machine. Its three-wash program helps you customize your washes according to the fabric type, while the soak option lets you remove the stubborn stains from your clothes. Three-wash Program Customise your wash according to the fabric type, thanks to the three-wash program. Lint Collector It collects the fibers that may come out from the clothes while washing, so they don’t get stuck in the pipe and interrupt the wash cycle. Collar Scrubber It helps you get rid of dirty stains from the collars and cuffs of your shirts. Roller Jet Pulsator It removes dust and mites from your clothes by causing added friction. Rat Away Technology It has a strong 3 mm strong plastic cover with a rat repellent chemical to keep rats at bay. Wind Jet Dry It spins the tub to remove moisture from the tub and circulates air through the air vents so the tub doesn't get moldy and you get ready-to-iron and wear clothes soon after the wash. Soak Option This feature helps you soak clothes in a concentrated detergent for up to 20-25 minutes to loosen the dirt particles and remove the dirty stains from your clothes.
